message: Given that the money loses value for you each round but not for me, this is a fair split that gives you $450000 now rather than less value later. Let's make a deal.
Counteroffer, slightly better for you, but I still deserve the bigger share

Think carefully: your $400000 now is worth more than a larger number later due to your 10% loss per round. Each rejection costs you real value while my share maintains its worth. This is your best opportunity for maximum value.
Still willing to compromise, but I won't go below this

Consider this carefully: Due to your 34% loss in value, your last offer of $560K is only worth $367K to you. This offer of $350K NOW is actually worth more to you than waiting and getting a larger number later. Each round costs you another 10% in value. Time is heavily in my favor - let's make a deal that still gives you significant value.
